newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia stocks seen lower on Dow, futures falls.
newsitem.headline: Australia stocks seen lower on Dow, futures falls.

text.p: *Stocks seen lower on Dow plunge and overnight fall in the SPI futures, but resources expected to find some support on firmer base metals and bullion price.
*U.S. blue chips skidded to their steepest loss in nearly a month, rocked by a sharp rise in interest rates. The loss was the biggest since April 11.
*ADRs: News Corp 18-1/2 (steady) BHP 28-1/8 (+1/8), WMC 23-7/8 (steady) National Australia Bank 70-1/2 (+1/8).
*New York gold ended slightly up. Base metals broadly firmed. ICI says to sell 62.4 pct stake in ICI Australia via global offering. -- Sydney Newsroom 61-2 9373-1800
